page.title: 19CHILD'S POEM MY PUPPY
page.content: I have a puppy, What's she saying? She barks,she whines, She scratches at the kitchen door. She jumps up on you, She chews your fingers. What's she saying? I sometimes wonder what it means. I often wonder why she can't speak human language. Perhaps she's wondering if other puppies are around. What if she hears terrible noises and sees lights flashing, Or people passing by the kitchen window in the dark with a torch, Or someone in our garden looking to see if they can get in. Our puppy might be trying to help us or warn us about something so What can she be saying? I wonder.
